LanguageData.VWE_UnderbarrelFlarestriker.label: underbarrel flarestriker
LanguageData.VWE_UnderbarrelFlarestriker.description: This weapon is equipped with an integrated under-barrel flare launcher. It fires bioferrite-fueled disruptor flares that illuminate the area and cause local psychic disruption.
LanguageData.VWE_UnderbarrelShotgun.label: underbarrel shotgun
LanguageData.VWE_UnderbarrelShotgun.description: This weapon features a stripped-down, under-barrel shotgun attachment. It provides the user with a secondary firing option specifically designed to breach doors or clear close-quarters threats without switching weapons.
